description: This file is a Python module that sets up a logger interface by importing a Log class from an external module and providing a wrapper function Create to instantiate logs.

methods.name: Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Factory function to create and return a log instance, wrapping ExternalLog.Log with specified parameters.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False):$/
ctags.signature: (name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
